reviewText: This training tape brought back memories, when I had to demonstrate my abilities to join the martial arts team in John Bowne HS. If you are ready to learn a form this is a good one. I however would suggest that the person get a good Si-Fu to determine if the techniques are correct. Also, some of the stretches and strength training exercises for praying mantis are similar to Hung and Tae Kwoon Do. Once again having a good Si-Fu in 7 Star is strongly recommended. As this tape omitts this infornation.
